description: Provide LLMs with time awareness capabilities by exposing tools to get current time, relative time, timestamps, days in a month, time zone conversions, and week information. Enhance your AI applications with accurate and flexible time-related data and operations. Easily integrate with popular LLM clients via standard MCP interfaces.

capabilities.name: current_time
capabilities.description: Get the current date and time.

capabilities.name: relative_time
capabilities.description: Get the relative time from now.

capabilities.name: days_in_month
capabilities.description: Get the number of days in a month. If no date is provided, get the number of days in the current month.

capabilities.name: get_timestamp
capabilities.description: Get the timestamp for the time.

capabilities.name: get_week_year
capabilities.description: Get the week and isoWeek of the year.
